about.content: I have honed diverse skills across various companies, enhancing my expertise in backend development.

projects.content: I have successfully spearheaded numerous projects with remarkable outcomes. Want to see the details?

contact.content: Looking for a developer or need help with a project? Let's get in touch!

about.description: I am a software developer with 5 years of experience specializing in backend web services within startup environments. I excel in backend API development using Spring Boot and managing Linux servers. Known for my rapid development and debugging skills, I consistently meet challenging deadlines and deliver reliable, high-quality results. My ability to adapt and grow in fast-paced environments, coupled with my continuous learning and deep understanding of the latest technological trends, enables me to effectively solve complex problems. My technical skill set includes Java, Spring, MySQL, AWS services, and Spring Batch, with a strong focus on SQL query optimization. I have successfully led multiple projects with agile project management and demonstrated my ability to work effectively in team environments.
about.experience: I have honed my skills working at various companies and collaborating with outstanding individuals.
